text:
Hi Jesse,
it is no longer possible to insert html code into rich text for a while. you have to create a custom module
just to clarify — its not stripping away _all_ code.. just changes I make to _existing_ html i have in there

Hello, I’m working on GDPR cookie permissions and our parent company’s legal team wants to have a tab that could pull up the consent banner so a user can always change their decision. I’m lacking some resources on how to enable that — has anyone developed something like it? Parent company is <http://www.partnerize.com|www.partnerize.com> so you can see the tab I’m referring to. Thank you!
